name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos Data File
summary: Learn about .YDT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos allows users to play duels against an artificial intelligence player named Joey Wheeler. Users can also play each other over a local area network (LAN).

description: File used by Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos, a video game based on the Yu-Gi-Oh! trading card game; contains game data used for storing and loading game information; saved in the Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos Common\​[playername]\​ directory with the filename trunk.ydt.
